name: Blue Square (Early Alpha 0.10)
description:
haha ooga booga blooga blue square hahaha ooga booga blooga orange pentagon uwu owo ooga booga

ok but really, to summarize what this game is, its a rpg-platformer game, currently, the games super old, so the rpg part isnt really there, thats for story mode, so for now its just a platformer


thats all i can really say.

UPDATES:
